title: Ancient coins found in Rajasthan show India’s currency history was 700 yrs older
description: An ASI superintendent archaeologist, Vinay Gupta's recent paper titled ‘The Earliest Coinage of Bharat as Unearthed from Bahaj Excavations’ throws new light on the coinage in India.

title: World Off Track On Climate Action Amid Fossil Fuel Crisis, Lobbying Pressures, Warns Treaty Director
description: The recent United Nations climate talks in Brazil reached an agreement that pledged more funding for countries to adapt to the wrath of extreme weather.

title: Ancient Croydon church grounds to be renovated as 'notorious' subway opposite is removed
description: The grounds around this historic Croydon church are set for a regeneration project, aiming to give the landmark the frontage ‘it deserves'

title: World off track on climate action amid fossil fuel crisis, lobbying pressures, warns Treaty director
description: The climate crisis disproportionately affects the poor. A global campaign urges a new treaty to phase out fossil fuels. Current climate talks are not on track. India's energy transition is crucial. A conference in Colombia will discuss overcoming fossil fuel dependence. This event aims to accelerate the global shift away from coal, oil, and gas.

title: World off track on climate action amid fossil fuel crisis lobbying pressures warns Treaty director
description: New Delhi, Nov 27 (PTI) The climate crisis will hit the poorest and the most marginalised the hardest -- people
